title: Intelligent sampling for surrogate modeling, hyperparameter optimization, and data analysis. (arXiv:2306.04066v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Sampling techniques are used in many fields, including design of experiments, image processing, and graphics. The techniques in each field are designed to meet the constraints specific to that field such as uniform coverage of the range of each dimension or random samples that are at least a certain distance apart from each other. When an application imposes new constraints, for example, by requiring samples in a non-rectangular domain or the addition of new samples to an existing set, a common solution is to modify the algorithm currently in use, often with less than satisfactory results. As an alternative, we propose the concept of intelligent sampling, where we devise algorithms specifically tailored to meet our sampling needs, either by creating new algorithms or by modifying suitable algorithms from other fields. Surprisingly, both qualitative and quantitative comparisons indicate that some relatively simple algorithms can be easily modified to meet the many sampling requirements

translated_title: 智能采样在代理建模、超参数优化和数据分析中的应用
translated_abstract: 采样技术被广泛应用于设计实验、图像处理和图形学等领域。每个领域中的技术都是为了满足特定的限制而设计的，例如每个维度的范围的均匀覆盖或至少在一定距离内随机采样。当应用程序强加新的限制时，例如需要在非矩形域中进行采样或将新样本添加到现有样本集中，常见的解决方法是修改当前使用的算法，但通常效果不佳。作为替代方案，我们提出了智能采样的概念，该概念旨在通过创建新算法或修改其他领域的合适算法来根据我们的采样需求设计算法。令人惊讶的是，定性和定量比较表明，一些相对简单的算法可以轻松修改以满足机器学习的许多采样需求，包括代理建模、超参数优化和数据分析。
tldr: 本文介绍了智能采样的概念，旨在通过创建新算法或修改其他领域的合适算法来根据我们的采样需求设计算法。研究表明，一些相对简单的算法可以轻松修改以满足机器学习的许多采样需求。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces the concept of intelligent sampling, aiming to design algorithms tailored to our sampling needs by creating new algorithms or modifying suitable algorithms from other fields. Research shows that some relatively simple algorithms can be easily modified to meet many sampling requirements in machine learning, including surrogate modeling, hyperparameter optimization, and data analysis.
